original_text: Our God, you chased out the people who were living in this land, so that your people, the Israelites, could move in. You have given this land to the descendants of your friend Abraham. It belongs to them for ever.
korean_text: 우리 하나님이시여 전에 이 땅 주민을 주의 백성 이스라엘 앞에서 쫓아내시고 그 땅을 주께서 사랑하시는 아브라함의 자손에게 영원히 주지 아니하셨나이까

sentences.original_text: Our God, you chased out the people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님, 당신은 그 백성을 쫓아내셨습니다

sentences.original_text: who were living in this land
so that your people, the Israelites, could move in
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 백성인 이스라엘 자손이 들어갈 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: to the descendants of your friend Abraham
It belongs to them for ever
